Auto refresh page is an tool that allows you to refresh the page automatically 🌀  

The main features are:  
👉 Set up several refresh timers for different pages;   
👉 No slowdowns of your device;  
👉 Page Auto Refresh is compatible with any website.  

To avoid unexpected behavior the timers will be cleared if you restart the browser.

Auto refresh page is easy to use, so you will immediately master and start using it 🔥  
Download now and enjoy!

Are you tired of constantly hitting the refresh button on your browser just to get the latest updates on your favorite websites? If so, Auto refresh page is the perfect solution for you! With this powerful Chrome extension, you can set up multiple refresh timers for different pages, ensuring that you always have the latest information at your fingertips.

Whether you're a social media addict, an avid online shopper, or just someone who likes to stay up-to-date with the latest news, Auto refresh page has got you covered. With its simple and intuitive interface, you can easily set up your desired refresh intervals and let the extension do the rest.

And the best part? Auto refresh page won't slow down your device or interfere with your browsing experience in any way. It works seamlessly with any website, ensuring that you always get the most up-to-date information without any hassle.

So why wait? Download Auto refresh page now and start enjoying the benefits of automatic page refresh today! Whether you're a busy professional, a student, or just someone who wants to stay informed, this powerful Chrome extension is the perfect tool for you. Try it out and see the difference for yourself - you won't be disappointed!
